Name: required_role_coverage
Description: Each sprint must have a Scrum Master assigned

Name: required_product_owner
Description: Each project must have exactly one Product Owner

Name: worker_capacity_limit
Description: No worker should be assigned beyond 100% availability

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: Sprint length must be between 1 and 4 weeks

Name: definition_of_done_met
Description: All tasks must meet Definition of Done before sprint review

Name: story_points_estimated
Description: All user stories in sprint backlog must have story points

Name: minimum_team_size
Description: Each team must have at least 3 members for Scrum effectiveness

Name: feature_priority_included
Description: High-priority features must be included before low-priority ones

Name: velocity_stability
Description: Current sprint effort should not exceed average velocity by more than 20%

Name: blockers_resolved_daily
Description: All critical blockers must be resolved within 24 hours

Name: documentation_mandatory
Description: Every implemented feature must have associated documentation

Name: ceremony_completion
Description: All four SCRUM ceremonies must be conducted per sprint
